name: Line and Ball 2D Sandbox
description:
Best played in full-screen mode

Hold down the left mouse button to move attract the ball towards the mouse, and release to send it away, then watch. Holding down the left mouse button also slows down the ball, and is the only way to stop the ball once it has begun moving.

On mobile, just hold a finger on the screen.

The physics in this aren't too realistic.
